casebody.data:
John Eric SANDLES, petitioner,
v.
Rita C. CHASTANG, et al. No. 13-8701. Supreme Court of the United States April 28, 2014.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
